abstract: Is the New Jersey governor, who recently lost his bid for re-election, in the race to become Bank of America’s next chief executive? The former Goldman Sachs head says he hasn’t spoken with the firm.
snippet: Is the New Jersey governor, who recently lost his bid for re-election, in the race to become Bank of America’s next chief executive? The former Goldman Sachs head says he hasn’t spoken with the firm.
lead_paragraph: Since Jon S. Corzine has been voted out of New Jersey’s governor seat, many have been asking what he will do next.

headline.main: Corzine Says He Hasn’t Spoken to Bank of America
